title: Dodge the Lover
description: A fast-paced action game where you dodge the lover while collecting points! Test your reflexes and timing skills as you navigate through increasingly challenging obstacles. Click on the right blocks to escape and survive as long as possible!
controls: Tap or click on blocks to dodge. Match the correct blocks to escape the lover and score points. Avoid wrong blocks that will end your game. The faster you react, the higher your score!
author: LightGame Team
